channel.title: IPhone 4 problems
channel.description:
If any of you have used the IPhone 4, or currently own one, have you noticed any problems using facebook or just browsing on safari such as constant freezing? slow connections and other problems that are towards the internet speed, battery life and connection issues?
I used to have a problem with the antennae, i had to go out and spend $31 on a case just so i wouldn't have to deal with any problems with my connection.
I am aware the Apple gave out free bumpers, have anyone of you actually used that application and gotten the bumper? i ordered back in July and still haven't gotten my bumper.
Do you believe that they released the IPhone 4 with too many bugs? i believe i should have gotten an Android and saved a little money.

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @javamantle javamantle
item.description:
@javamantle wrote:

Msn sometimes glitches and other wifi stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Thug-life:

Take it into an Apple store. They’re usually very good when it comes to things like this, they’ve even been replacing phones just because their case has left a few marks around the steel band.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:9, topic:370050"][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=466165.msg3415308#msg3415308 date=1290996930]
I’d bet it’s probably because you’re holding it wrong.

(still not old, lololololol :P)

Anyway, if you are in the US locked onto AT&T as your carrier, they are notorious for having horrible data connections, do you still have problems when it’s connected to wifi?
[/quote]

I’m from Canada, and yes i do notice problems when i am only connected to WiFi.[/quote]
ive never had any wifi issues? i think this may just be you

Read full topic

item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

Yeah they replace the phones easily because the iphone’s hardware is sticked in so tight its just easier to give a new phone

I’d bet it’s probably because you’re holding it wrong.

Anyway, if you are in the US locked onto AT&T as your carrier, they are notorious for having horrible data connections, do you still have problems when it’s connected to wifi?

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

No problems with mine either, except I did have a rather strange brightness issue where it would randomly change (regardless of the actual light sensor). But a restore fixed that.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

No problems with mine, except a couple issues with jailbroken stuff, like Safari Download Manager.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

abatssk8ter:

It’s an Apple iPhone, What carrier do you think hes on?

Not all countries have the iPhone locked to one network. The UK has the iPhone 4 on every major mobile phone network (O2, 3, Orange, Vodaphone, T-Mobile, etc).

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

It’s an Apple iPhone, What carrier do you think hes on?

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:2, topic:370050”]I’ve had absolutely no problems with mine, except the antenna problem. I used the free case program and my case, worth £25, came within two weeks of me applying. No slow connection, facebook app is a little bugged but generally work fine, and as long as I have a 3g or wireless connection Safari works perfectly.

I love my Iphone 4 and i really do believe it’s the best smart phone on the market.[/quote]

The most annoying thing with mine has to do with the facebook app, you generally have to press somewhere you want to go 3-4 times.

Edit - Which carrier are you on?

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 4 problems
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I’ve had absolutely no problems with mine, except the antenna problem. I used the free case program and my case, worth £25, came within two weeks of me applying. No slow connection, facebook app is a little bugged but generally work fine, and as long as I have a 3g or wireless connection Safari works perfectly.

I love my Iphone 4 and i really do believe it’s the best smart phone on the market.

Read full topic
